text: Emirates Office Tower is a skyscraper in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It is 355 meters (1,163 feet) tall and has 54 floors. It was built in 2000 and is one of the tallest buildings in the world. Emirates Office Tower is next to the Jumeirah Emirates Towers Hotel, which is also one of the tallest buildings in the world at 309m (1,014ft). ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in the world ==References== ==Other websites== * Emporis.com - Emirates Office Tower *SkycraperPage.com â€“ Emirates Office Tower Category:Skyscrapers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Buildings and structures in Dubai Category:2000 establishments in Asia Category:Establishments in the United Arab Emirates
title: Emirates Office Tower
